experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Entegral Holdings
workDescription: During my time with Entegral, I have helped rewrite an API using Typescript, NestJS, and MongoDB to store, transfer, and update customer data, and developed a machine-learning application using Python and GCP to analyze and correct body shop data.

experiences.title: Technical Service Assistant
experiences.subtitle: Exact Sciences
workDescription: I worked with the IT department, keeping the tech infrastructure up and running. I spend time in the labs building and maintaining the tech infrastructure, while also working on configuring employee setups and accesses. I also worked on projects to improve future user setup and interfacing and allow for better storage numbers management.

experiences.title: Independent Researcher / Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Washington University in St. Louis
workDescription: I worked in the lab of MD/Ph.D. Andrew Kau and two of the lab's computational & systems biology graduate students. During my time at the lab, I researched, tested, and aided in the development of an A.I. that scans the gut microbiome to detect asthma in young patients. During my time at the lab, I self-taught myself how to use R and RStudios, and learned many statistics topics used in A.I. research and development. At the end of the internship, I gave a presentation of my findings to the entire lab and will hopefully soon be cited on the scientific publication.
